title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas
text_raw:
1. 

(a) This Order may be cited as the District Court Districts and Areas 
(Amendment) and Variation of Days and Hours (District No. 21 
- Youghal, Carrick-on-Suir, Cashel, Clonmel, Dungarvan and 
Lismore) Order 2022. 

(b) This Order shall come into operation on 1st day of January
text_norm: 1 (a) order may cited district court district area (amendment) variation day hour (district no 21 - youghal carrick-on-suir cashel clonmel dungarvan lismore) order 2022 (b) order shall come operation 1st day january

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: 2 The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5
text_raw:
2023. 

2 The First Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. No. 5 

of 1961), is hereby amended by – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

the substitution at reference number 228 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Carrick-on-Suir - First and third 
Wednesday in each month at 10:30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 229 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Cashel - First, second and third 
Thursday in each month at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 231 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Clonmel - First, second, third and 
fourth Tuesday in each month at 10.30 a.m. and the fourth 
Thursday in each month at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 240 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Dungarvan - Second, third and 
fourth Monday in each month at 10:30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 242 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Lismore (sitting at Dungarvan) - 
First Monday in each month at 10:30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 54 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Youghal - Second and fourth 
Wednesday in each month at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

3 The Second Schedule to the District Court (Areas) Order, 1961 (S.I. 

No. 5 of 1961), is hereby amended by - 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 22nd November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [584] 3 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

the substitution at reference number 196 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Carrick-on-Suir - First and third 
Wednesday in each month at 10:30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 197 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Cashel - First, second and third 
Thursday in each month at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 199 for the matter in 
column (4) of the following: “Clonmel - First, second, third and 
fourth Tuesday in each month at 10.30 a.m. and the fourth 
Thursday in each month at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 206 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Dungarvan – Second, third and 
fourth Monday in each month at 10:30 a.m.”, and 

the substitution at reference number 208 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Lismore (sitting at Dungarvan) – 
First Monday in each month at 10:30 a.m.”. 

the substitution at reference number 49 for the matters in 
column (4) of the following: “Youghal - Second and fourth 
Wednesday in each month at 10.30 a.m.”, and 

4 Business transacted in the District Court that is initiated and not 
completed before commencement of this Order shall be continued and 
completed as if this Order had been in force at the time at which such business 
had been initiated. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [584] 

GIVEN under the Seal of the Courts Service 
14 November 2022 

PAUL KELLY, 
Member of the Board of the Courts Service authorised to sign 
documents under the Seal of the Courts Service. 

MAURA HOWE, 
Officer of the Courts Service designated for the purpose of 

authenticating the Seal of the Courts Service, pursuant to section 
10 of the Courts Service Act 1998. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [584] 5

title: the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 (No. 39 of 1961), section 16 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order provides for the variation of Days and Hours at Carrick-on-Suir, 
Cashel, Clonmel, Dungarvan, Lismore (sitting at Dungarvan) and Youghal 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [584]
